Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    It is a controller with common method of all controller
    ActionChoiceController
    It controls action choice scene
    CharacterChoiceController
    It controls choice character scene
    DecodeMessage
    It links an image with a card, map, character, player board, player token, ammo tile, power up
    EffectChoiceController
    It controls effectChoice scene
    GameBoardController
    It controls scene of gameboard
    GenericPaymentController
    It controls scene of payment
    GUI
    It manages message and shows its request or update
    LobbyChioceController
    It menage lobby choice scene
    LoginController
    It controls login scene
    LoginMain
    It launch GUI interface
    MapController
    It controls scene in which user choose map if the game
    PositionChoiceController
    It controls scene of position choice
    PowerUpChoiceController
    It controls powerUp choice scene
    ReconnectionController
    It controls scene of reconnection
    WeaponChoiceController
    It controls action choice scene
